response.original_title: Myths and Logic of Shaolin Kung Fu
response.overview: Providing a history of the Shaolin Kung Fu art form as well as an examination of the incredible physical prowess required, this film features footage of some of the most skilled Shaolin monks demonstrating the intricacies of the fighting style. Explore the world of Shaolin Kung Fu, considered the original -- and best -- of all kung fu fighting styles. Suitable for viewing by beginners and advanced martial artists alike.
response.tagline: Foreign, Martial Arts, Sports Documentaries, Martial Arts, Boxing & Wrestling, Hong Kong, Mandarin Language, Kung Fu, Foreign Regions, Foreign Languages
response.title: Myths and Logic of Shaolin Kung Fu
